mapper.insert: insert into planreview(userplan_id, user_id, title, content, rate, img) values(#{planId}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rate}, #{img})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, userplan_id, title, content, rate, img, case when date_format(create_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(create_date, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(create_date, '%y.%m.%d') end create_date from planreview where id = #{id}

select id, user_id, userplan_id, title, content, rate, img, case when date_format(create_date, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(create_date, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(create_date, '%y.%m.%d') end create_date from planreview order by id desc
